00018 
00020 #define TX_QUEUE_SIZE       ( 0x1000 )

00023 #define DEFAULT_BAUD_RATE   ( 9600 )

00034 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00035 SerialPort * SerialPort::getInstance()
00036 {
00037     if( sInstance == NULL )
00038     {
00039         sInstance = new SerialPort();
00040         atexit( SerialPort::destroyInstance );
00041     }
00042 
00043     return sInstance;
00044 }

00052     sInstance = NULL;

00055 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00058 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00059 void SerialPort::getPortList( std::list<CString> &aList )
00060 {
00061     aList.clear();
00062 
00063     // Registry method is faster and gets all ports, when it works...
00064     if( !SerialPort::getPortListFromRegistry( aList ) )
00065     {
00066         // but if it doesn't, fall back to testing which ports can be opened
00067         aList.clear();
00068         SerialPort::getPortListEnum( aList );
00069     }
00070 }

00083 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00089 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00090 bool SerialPort::init
00091     (
00092     const CString& port
00093     )
00094 {
00095     COMMTIMEOUTS    timeouts;
00096 
00097     // Only clear the log if it isn't already open.
00098     // Reinitializing the com port shouldn't clear the log.
00099     if( !Logger::isLogOpen() )
00100         Logger::clearLog();
00101 
00102     close();
00103 
00104     CString portDeviceFile;
00105     portDeviceFile.Format( _T("\\\\.\\%s"), port );
00106     mComPortHandle = CreateFile
00107         (
00108         portDeviceFile.GetString(),
00109         GENERIC_READ | GENERIC_WRITE,
00110         0,         /* exclusive access                     */
00111         NULL,      /* no security attributes               */
00112         OPEN_EXISTING,
00113         FILE_ATTRIBUTE_NORMAL,
00114         NULL
00115         );
00116 
00117     if( mComPortHandle == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE )
00118     {
00119         recordErrorText( _T("opening port") );
00120         return false;
00121     }
00122 
00123     if( !setBaudRate( DEFAULT_BAUD_RATE ) )
00124     {
00125         return false;
00126     }
00127 
00128     if( !SetupComm( mComPortHandle, RX_QUEUE_SIZE, TX_QUEUE_SIZE ) )
00129     {
00130         recordErrorText( _T("setting up buffers") );
00131         close();
00132         return false;
00133     }
00134 
00135     timeouts.ReadIntervalTimeout         = 0;
00136     timeouts.ReadTotalTimeoutMultiplier  = 0;
00137     timeouts.ReadTotalTimeoutConstant    = 0;
00138     timeouts.WriteTotalTimeoutMultiplier = 0;
00139     timeouts.WriteTotalTimeoutConstant   = 0;
00140 
00141     if( !SetCommTimeouts( mComPortHandle, &timeouts ) )
00142     {
00143         recordErrorText( _T("setting timeouts") );
00144         close();
00145         return false;
00146     }
00147 
00148     if( !PurgeComm( mComPortHandle, PURGE_RXABORT | PURGE_RXCLEAR | PURGE_TXABORT | PURGE_TXCLEAR ) )
00149     {
00150         recordErrorText( _T("clearing buffers") );
00151         close();
00152         return false;
00153     }
00154 
00155     mPortName = port;
00156 
00157     return true;
00158 }
00159 
00160 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00164 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00165 void SerialPort::close()
00166 {
00167     if( isOpen() )
00168     {
00169         CloseHandle( mComPortHandle );
00170         mComPortHandle = INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE;
00171         mPortName = "";
00172     }
00173 }

00175 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00177 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00178 void SerialPort::pumpRx()
00179 {
00180     /*----------------------------------------------------------
00181     Local Variables
00182     ----------------------------------------------------------*/
00183     uint8                   readBuffer[ 256 ];
00184     int                     readSize;
00185     DWORD                   error;
00186     COMSTAT                 status;
00187 
00188     //check for error
00189     ClearCommError( mComPortHandle, &error, &status );
00190     if( error != 0 )
00191     {
00192         PurgeComm( mComPortHandle, PURGE_RXABORT | PURGE_RXCLEAR );
00193         return;
00194     }
00195 
00196     //check read size...if zero return because nothing to do
00197     readSize = minval( status.cbInQue, sizeof( readBuffer ) );
00198     if( readSize == 0 )
00199         return;
00200 
00201     if( ReadFile( mComPortHandle, readBuffer, readSize, (LPDWORD)&readSize, NULL ) == 0 )
00202     {
00203         ClearCommError( mComPortHandle, &error, &status );
00204         if( ( error & CE_OVERRUN ) ||
00205             ( error & CE_RXOVER  ) )
00206         {
00207             PurgeComm( mComPortHandle, PURGE_RXABORT | PURGE_RXCLEAR );
00208         }
00209         return;
00210     }
00211     if( readSize == 0 )
00212         return;
00213 
00214     // Push the received bytes up to the link layer
00215     if( mLinkLayer )
00216     {
00217         mLinkLayer->rx( readBuffer, readSize );
00218     }
00219 }
00220 
00221 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00226 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00227 bool SerialPort::tx
00228     (
00229     uint8  * aData,
00230     uint16   aSize
00231     )
00232 {
00233     DWORD error;
00234     DWORD writeCount;
00235     COMSTAT status;
00236 
00237     ASSERT( mComPortHandle != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE );
00238     ASSERT( aData != NULL );
00239     ASSERT( aSize != 0 );
00240 
00241     if( WriteFile( mComPortHandle, aData, aSize, (LPDWORD)&writeCount, NULL ) == 0 )
00242     {
00243         ClearCommError( mComPortHandle, &error, &status );
00244         if( error & CE_TXFULL )
00245         {
00246             PurgeComm( mComPortHandle, PURGE_TXABORT | PURGE_TXCLEAR );
00247         }
00248         return false;
00249     }
00250     return true;
00251 }

00253 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00261 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00262 bool SerialPort::getPortListFromRegistry
00263     (
00264     std::list<CString> &aList
00265     )
00266 {
00267     HKEY     hKey;             // handle for the key being queried
00268     DWORD    numValues;        // number of values for key
00269     DWORD    maxValueLen;      // longest value name
00270     DWORD    maxDataLen;       // longest value data
00271     DWORD    dataType;         // out: code indicating type of data
00272     BYTE     *dataBuf;         // out: data buffer
00273     DWORD    dataLen;          // out: number of bytes
00274     DWORD i, retCode;
00275 
00276     TCHAR  *valueBuf;
00277     DWORD  valueLen;
00278 
00279     bool retval = false;
00280 
00281     if( RegOpenKeyEx
00282         (
00283         HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE,
00284         TEXT("HARDWARE\\DEVICEMAP\\SERIALCOMM"),
00285         0,
00286         KEY_READ,
00287         &hKey
00288         ) == ERROR_SUCCESS )
00289     {
00290         // Get the class name and the value count.
00291         retCode = RegQueryInfoKey
00292             (
00293             hKey,           // key handle
00294             NULL, NULL,     // buffer and size of class name, don't care
00295             NULL,           // reserved
00296             NULL, NULL,     // number and length of subkeys, don't care
00297             NULL,           // longest class string, don't care
00298             &numValues,     // number of values for this key
00299             &maxValueLen,   // longest value name
00300             &maxDataLen,    // longest value data
00301             NULL, NULL      // security descriptor, last write time, don't care
00302             );
00303 
00304         // Enumerate the values and data under this key.
00305         if( numValues )
00306         {
00307             valueBuf = new TCHAR[maxValueLen + 1];
00308             dataBuf  = new BYTE[maxDataLen + 1];
00309             retval = true;
00310 
00311             for( i = 0, retCode = ERROR_SUCCESS; i < numValues; i++ )
00312             {
00313                 valueLen = maxValueLen + 1;
00314                 dataLen = maxDataLen + 1;
00315                 valueBuf[0] = '\0';
00316                 retCode = RegEnumValue
00317                     (
00318                     hKey,
00319                     i,
00320                     valueBuf,
00321                     &valueLen,
00322                     NULL,
00323                     &dataType,
00324                     dataBuf,
00325                     &dataLen
00326                     );
00327                 if( retCode == ERROR_SUCCESS )
00328                 {
00329                     if( dataType == REG_SZ )
00330                         aList.push_back( CString( (TCHAR*)dataBuf ) );
00331                 }
00332                 else
00333                     retval = false;
00334 
00335             } // end of for loop
00336 
00337             delete[] valueBuf;
00338             delete[] dataBuf;
00339         } // end of if( numValues )
00340 
00341     } // end of if( RegOpenKey )
00342 
00343     RegCloseKey( hKey );
00344     return retval;
00345 }

00347 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00350 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00351 void SerialPort::getPortListEnum
00352     (
00353     std::list<CString> &aList
00354     )
00355 {
00356     getInstance()->close();
00357 
00358     for( int portNum = 1; portNum <= 256; portNum++ )
00359     {
00360         CString portDeviceFile;  // Device filename
00361         CString portName;        // Display/"friendly" name
00362         HANDLE hPort;
00363         portName.Format( _T("COM%u"), portNum );
00364         portDeviceFile.Format( _T("\\\\.\\%s"), portName );
00365 
00366         hPort = CreateFile
00367                     (
00368                     portDeviceFile,
00369                     GENERIC_READ | GENERIC_WRITE,
00370                     0,
00371                     NULL,
00372                     OPEN_EXISTING,
00373                     0,
00374                     NULL
00375                     );
00376         if( hPort != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE )
00377         {
00378             aList.push_back( portName );
00379             ::CloseHandle( hPort );
00380         }
00381 #if defined( _DEBUG )
00382         else
00383         {
00384             TRACE( "Failed to open port %s, error was %d\n", portName.GetBuffer(), GetLastError() );
00385         }
00386 #endif
00387     }
00388 }

00398 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00402 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00403 void SerialPort::onTimer()
00404 {
00405     if( mComPortHandle != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE )
00406         pumpRx();
00407 }

00411 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00412 SerialPort::~SerialPort()
00413 {
00414     if( mLinkLayer )
00415     {
00416         mLinkLayer->setPhysicalLayer( NULL );
00417     }
00418     close();
00419 }

00421 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00424 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00425 void SerialPort::recordErrorText
00426     (
00427     const CString& aOperation
00428     )
00429 {
00430     LPTSTR pszMessage;
00431     DWORD  errorCode = GetLastError();
00432 
00433     ASSERT( errorCode != ERROR_SUCCESS );
00434 
00435     FormatMessage
00436         (
00437         FORMAT_MESSAGE_ALLOCATE_BUFFER | FORMAT_MESSAGE_FROM_SYSTEM | FORMAT_MESSAGE_IGNORE_INSERTS,
00438         NULL,
00439         errorCode,
00440         MAKELANGID( LANG_NEUTRAL, SUBLANG_DEFAULT ),
00441         (LPTSTR)&pszMessage,
00442         0,
00443         NULL
00444         );
00445     mLastErrorText.Format( _T("%s: %s"), aOperation, CString( pszMessage ) );
00446     LocalFree( pszMessage );
00447 }

00468 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00472 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00473 bool SerialPort::setBaudRate
00474     (
00475     uint32 aBaudRate
00476     )
00477 {
00478     DCB             dcb;
00479 
00480     ASSERT( mComPortHandle != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE );
00481 
00482     dcb.DCBlength = sizeof( DCB );
00483     if( !GetCommState( mComPortHandle, &dcb ) )
00484     {
00485         recordErrorText( _T("getting port state") );
00486         close();
00487         return false;
00488     }
00489 
00490     dcb.fBinary             = TRUE;
00491     dcb.BaudRate            = aBaudRate;
00492     dcb.ByteSize            = 8;
00493     dcb.StopBits            = ONESTOPBIT;
00494     dcb.Parity              = NOPARITY;
00495     dcb.fParity             = FALSE;
00496     dcb.fAbortOnError       = FALSE;
00497     dcb.fOutxCtsFlow        = FALSE;
00498     dcb.fOutxDsrFlow        = FALSE;
00499     dcb.fDtrControl         = DTR_CONTROL_DISABLE;
00500     dcb.fRtsControl         = RTS_CONTROL_DISABLE;
00501     dcb.fDsrSensitivity     = FALSE;
00502     dcb.fTXContinueOnXoff   = FALSE;
00503     dcb.fOutX               = FALSE;
00504     dcb.fInX                = FALSE;
00505     dcb.fNull               = FALSE;
00506 
00507     if( !SetCommState( mComPortHandle, &dcb ) )
00508     {
00509         recordErrorText( _T("setting serial port parameters") );
00510         close();
00511         return false;
00512     }
00513 
00514     return true;
00515 }
